title: Discovery Questions
description: Master the art of asking questions that uncover needs and build rapport.

lessons.title: The Power of Questions
lessons.content: Great salespeople ask great questions. Learn why discovery is the foundation of consultative selling.
objectives: Understand why questions matter more than pitching
keyPoints: The person asking questions controls the conversation
Discovery uncovers needs you can solve
Questions build trust faster than statements

exercises.title: Question Audit
exercises.instructions: Record your next 3 calls and count the ratio of questions to statements.

lessons.title: Open vs. Closed Questions
lessons.content: Different questions serve different purposes. Learn when to use open and closed questions strategically.
objectives: Distinguish between open and closed questions
Know when to use each type
keyPoints: Open questions explore, closed questions confirm

exercises.title: Question Type Drill
exercises.instructions: Convert 10 closed questions into open questions, and vice versa.

lessons.title: SPIN Questioning
lessons.content: The SPIN framework (Situation, Problem, Implication, Need-payoff) is a proven discovery methodology.
objectives: Apply SPIN to your sales process
keyPoints: Need-payoff questions let them sell themselves

exercises.title: SPIN Sequence Practice
exercises.instructions: Conduct a full SPIN discovery with the AI prospect.

lessons.title: Active Listening
lessons.content: Asking great questions means nothing if you don't listen to the answers. Master active listening.
keyPoints: Listen to understand, not to respond
Take notes to show you care

exercises.title: Paraphrase Challenge
exercises.instructions: In your next conversation, paraphrase every response before asking your next question.

scenarios.title: Discovery Deep Dive
scenarios.description: Conduct a full discovery call with a prospect who has complex needs.
scenarios.personaHint: Use the friendly-manager persona. Focus on uncovering 3+ pain points.

scenarios.title: The One-Word Responder
scenarios.description: Practice getting a taciturn prospect to open up through skillful questioning.
scenarios.personaHint: Use the skeptical-cfo persona. Work to build rapport through questions.
